title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 158.11 - Notice of qualification as receiver, etc
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 158.11 - Notice of qualification as receiver, etc

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 658(e)

Every receiver, trustee in bankruptcy, assignee for benefit of creditors, or other like fiduciary (a) of a taxpayer subject to New York State personal income tax, (b) of a partnership which must file a New York State partnership return in accordance with section
151.4
of this Title, or (c) of an employer which must withhold New York State personal income taxes pursuant to Part 171 of this Title, required under the Internal Revenue Code and its applicable regulations to give notice of his or its qualification to act in such capacity must, within the same required period, give like written notice to the Tax Commission (see Internal Revenue Code, section 6036, and section 301.6036 -1(a) of the Internal Revenue Code Regulations). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
158.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
